import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import Footer from '../components/Footer'; export default function ProductDetails() { const location = useLocation(); const product = location.state; return ( <>

By {product.dealer} | Product Code: {product.id}

  • Material: {product.material}
  • Metal: {product.metal}
) } /* {product.id} {product.name} {product.price} {product.metal} {Object.values(product.pricebreakup[0])[0]} */
